title: India targeted Nur Khan Airbase, Murid base, Shorkot base but all PAF assets safe: DG ISPR - DAWN.COM
content:
Inter-Services Public Relations (ISPR) Director General Lt Gen Ahmed Sharif Chaudhry has said that India has targeted the Pakistan Air Force’s (PAF) Nur Khan (Chaklala, Rawalpindi), Murid (Chakwal) and Rafiqui (Shorkot in Jhang district) air bases, but all assets of the air force remain safe.

“Continuing its naked aggression, India some time back has fired air-to-surface missiles with its jets.

“PAF Nur Khan base, PAF Murid base and Shorkot base were targeted. According to information till now, all PAF assets are safe.”
